text:
Kiersey Nicole Clemons (born December 17, 1993) is an American actress and singer.
She is known for her roles in "," "Flatliners", "Hearts Beat Loud", and the 2019 remake of "Lady and the Tramp". She voiced the role of Dee Dee Skyes in the animated movie "Scoob!".
Clemons was cast as Iris West in the "Justice League", but her scenes were cut.
